message:
fix: DEV-2655: Support both region drawing behaviours with a settings flag (#726)

* fix: DEV-2655: allow cmd or ctrl to create regions immediately even with deselect on canvas click enabled.

* fix: DEV-2655: Support both region drawing behaviours with a settings flag.

* fix: DEV-2655: use the settings flag exlusively

* fix: DEV-2655: typo in settings description

* Update ImageView.js

* fix: DEV-2655: put deselection behaviour settings behind feature flag
